Description.Text: This property was built in 2012 and comprises 44 rooms over 4 floors. It offers spacious accommodation with free Wi-Fi, a restaurant and 24-hour reception.

Just 200 metres from St Volodymyr’s Cathedral, this elegant hotel enjoys a central location in Kiev's historic Old Town. Set in Kiev’s cultural centre, visitors will find attractions such as the National Opera House of Ukraine and the Kreschatyk main boulevard are a 10-minute walk from the hotel.Zolotye Vorota Metro Station is 400 metres from Royal City Grand and offers easy connections around Kiev. Boryspil International Airport is also a 35-minute drive away.
The property has a traditional exterior
The restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner
The hotel has a small lobby
